name: Key Bind
description:
This is my GMTK gamejam 2021 entry

The game takes the theme "Joined Together" as joining the Key itself together (aka keybinding).

The game is a puzzle platformer with the twist that you can only press 1 button at a time and you have to bind  buttons together to press multiple.

*Note: if the camera gets zoomed in on the player, zoom the browser in and out a bit (I have no idea why this happens). If you still have trouble, there is a window version available for download 

Tutorial:

Bind buttons together by pressing "bind" and then dragging buttons together.

Drag 2 bound buttons together to unbind them.

"Shoot" and "Dash" will only work if bound to one or more directional buttons.

Shoot all red circle enemies to open the red door.

Enter the portal to complete the level.
